name: Escape: VR
description: The main objective in this game is to find your way out.
minimum_requirements: OS: Win 7 Processor: i5 Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: GTX 970 / RX 480 Storage: 250 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Win 10 Processor: i7 Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: GTX 1080 Storage: 250 MB available space
